attributes.action: limit the deadline of any further petitions posted on this site to the date of the next general election, to ensure petitions dont pass unanswered.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: just tryin to act in enviromentally friendly way. dont waste electricity e mailing.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
